title: Rational Function Zeros - solving an inequality

content.question: ​The rational function <math alttext="r"><mi>r</mi></math> is given by <math alttext="r open parentheses x close parentheses equals fraction numerator x cubed plus 4 x squared plus 4 x over denominator x squared minus 9 end fraction"><mi>r</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>-</mo><mn>9</mn></mrow></mfrac></math>. On what intervals of <math alttext="x"><mi>x</mi></math> is <math alttext="r open parentheses x close parentheses greater or equal than 0"><mi>r</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>≥</mo><mn>0</mn></math> ?

choices.label: ​<math alttext="negative 3 less than x less than 3"><mo>-</mo><mn>3</mn><mo><</mo><mi>x</mi><mo><</mo><mn>3</mn></math>

​<math alttext="negative 3 less than x less than negative 2"><mo>-</mo><mn>3</mn><mo><</mo><mi>x</mi><mo><</mo><mo>-</mo><mn>2</mn></math>, <math alttext="negative 2 less than x less than 0"><mo>-</mo><mn>2</mn><mo><</mo><mi>x</mi><mo><</mo><mn>0</mn></math>, and <math alttext="x greater than 3"><mi>x</mi><mo>></mo><mn>3</mn></math> only

​<math alttext="negative 3 less than x less or equal than 0"><mo>-</mo><mn>3</mn><mo><</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>≤</mo><mn>0</mn></math> and <math alttext="x greater than 3"><mi>x</mi><mo>></mo><mn>3</mn></math>

content.answer: ​<math alttext="negative 3 less than x less or equal than 0"><mo>-</mo><mn>3</mn><mo><</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>≤</mo><mn>0</mn></math> and <math alttext="x greater than 3"><mi>x</mi><mo>></mo><mn>3</mn></math>

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Solve equations and inequalities represented analytically, with and without technology.
